trans-unit.source: A trigger action that pauses a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref>.
Use a PauseStoryboard with an <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> or a <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> to pause a Storyboard.
trans-unit.target: 使用與 PauseStoryboard<xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>或<xref:System.Windows.Trigger>暫停分鏡腳本。</xref:System.Windows.Trigger> </xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>

trans-unit.source: PauseStoryboard only affects a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> when it is active (after the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> starts).
trans-unit.target: 只會影響 PauseStoryboard<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>何時為使用中 (之後<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>啟動)。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: To control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, the PauseStoryboard must reference the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> that controls that <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.
trans-unit.target: 控制<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>、 PauseStoryboard 必須參考<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>控制該<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for an example.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[How to︰ 使用事件觸發程序來控制分鏡腳本之後啟動](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)的範例。

trans-unit.source: Beginning a Paused Animation When a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> action is triggered after it has been paused, it appears to resume and restart.
trans-unit.target: 從開始暫停動畫<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>暫停後觸發動作，它會顯示恢復並重新啟動。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>

trans-unit.source: That's not what actually happens, however: the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> action actually replaces itself with an unpaused version.
trans-unit.target: 這是不實際發生的狀況，不過︰<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>動作實際上本身以取代未暫停的版本。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>

trans-unit.source: Each time a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> action is triggered, clock objects are created for its storyboard.
trans-unit.target: 每次<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>觸發動作、 其分鏡腳本建立時鐘的物件。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>

trans-unit.source: These clocks are distributed to the properties they animate.
trans-unit.target: 這些時鐘發佈至所建立動畫的屬性。

trans-unit.source: So, when a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> is triggered again, it doesn't restart its clocks, it replaces them with new clocks.
trans-unit.target: 因此，<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>觸發一次，它不會重新啟動其時鐘，會取代新時鐘。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard"></xref>類別。
